children.value: Hello everyone, I hope you all have had a safe flight.
We have alot to show you here. You will travel back to the Prehistoric Era with what you will witness today.
Have some time to settle in and be ready to leave the Lodge at noon for the tour!
Also everyone, please keep in mind....
This park is near and dear to me, so please treat it with respect.
Welcome everyone, to the JURRASSIC PARK!
And you! Umm....
What was your name again?
specialEvent
Ok [name], being the new technician, you are going to be responsible for fixing any electical issues the park may encounter.
Ed Reigis here will give you a tour around the Lodge, where most of the operations take place.
Before you're off, make sure not to hurt any of MY dinosaurs. It is park property and costs alot of money.
Anyways, welcome aboard the Jurassic Park team!
What are you still doing here? Off with you!
endConvo
So you're the new guy, erm new girl?
Honestly, I have no clue what you are.
Anyways!
Mr Hammond told me that I'll be showing you the ropes around here.
Since we're already here, I'll show you the control room underneath this here lodge, where you'll meet your fellow coworkers.
We're not in a rush though so feel free to look around, I'll be waiting by the staircase just up ahead.
endConvo
